author: svn-role
msg: Case-insensitive matching works only for ASCII, and apr_fnmatch() can
trigger undefined behaviour when matching UTF-8 data case-insensitively.

author: danielsh
msg: Teach backport.pl to open an interactive subshell.
(prompt): Let the caller specify the text.
(handle_entry): Open a subshell, update calls to prompt().
